title: Superman
desc:
Post 19
***Airborne Rescue** (1x, Charge 90%)*
All visits to your target will fail, and your target will be roleblocked.
***Clark Kent** (passive)*
All investigative actions targeting you will receive an incorrect result.
***Kryptonite** (passive)*
Your defense power is reduced to -1.0x when visited by a player whose last response included the word "kryptonite."
